name: One Minute Max
description:
A or Left Arrow: Left
D or Right Arrow: Right
W, Up Arrow, or Spacebar: Jump
S or Down Arrow: Look Down
R: Restart Level

21XX.  Everything short of the heat death of the universe has wiped all of humanity off the face of the Earth. Almost... You are the only human left alive. And you are dying. There is a vaccine out there which will save you, but you only have one minute to reach it before you die.
You are... ONE MINUTE MAX

Programming and Audio Direction: Katrina Scialdone (@katrinakitten on Itch.io)
Asset Design and Animation: Serena Denault
